trans-unit.source: Represents a cell of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> control.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell" /> class.
The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
Determines the final size and placement of the cell content.
The final size of the control.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.ArrangeOverride%2A> method determines the arrangement of the cell content with a gridline on the right.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.ArrangeOverride%2A> método determina a disposição da célula conteúda com uma linha de grade à direita.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column that the cell is in.
The column that the cell is in.
trans-unit.target: A coluna em que a célula se encontra.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is in edit mode.
<see langword="true" /> if the cell is in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a célula estiver em modo de edição; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão registrado é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que pode influenciar o valor, consulte <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing" /> dependency property.
Gets a value that indicates whether the cell can be put in edit mode.
<see langword="true" /> if the cell cannot be put in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a célula não pode ser colocada no modo; de edição Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão registrado é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que pode influenciar o valor, consulte <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `true` to make an individual cell read-only.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly%2A> propriedade `true` para tornar uma célula individual somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` to make all cells in an individual column read-only.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true` para fazer todas as células em uma coluna individual somente leitura.

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property to `true` to make all cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> read-only If there is a conflict between the settings at the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, column, and cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: Definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> propriedade `true` para fazer todas as células da <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> somente leitura se houver um conflito entre as configurações no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, coluna e níveis de célula, um valor de `true` tem precedência sobre um valor de `false`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly" /> dependency property.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the cell is selected.
<see langword="true" /> if the cell is selected; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se a célula está selecionada. Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão registrado é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o que pode influenciar o valor, consulte <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected> evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected> event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected> evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected" /> dependency property.
The maximum size that the cell can occupy.
Determines the desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell" />.
The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell" />.
The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.MeasureOverride%2A> method measures the area needed for the cell and the gridline on the right.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.MeasureOverride%2A> método mede a área necessária para a célula e a linha de grade à direita.

trans-unit.source: The old column definition.
The new column definition.
Called when the cell's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column" /> property changes.
This method is not called if changes are made to the current column definition.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado não se forem feitas alterações para a definição de coluna atual.

trans-unit.source: It is called only if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> property is set.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado apenas se o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> está definida.

trans-unit.source: Returns the automation peer for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell" />.
The automation peer for this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> exposes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> to [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation#initcap](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomationsharpinitcap-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridCellAutomationPeer> expõe o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> para [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uiautomation#initcap](~/includes/tlasharptla-uiautomationsharpinitcap-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The new value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing" /> property.
Called when the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsEditing" /> property changes.
This method changes the visual state of the cell between the Editing and Display states.
trans-unit.target: Esse método altera o estado visual da célula entre os estados de exibição e edição.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Reports that a key was pressed.
This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse método passa a entrada do teclado para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Cada coluna trata a entrada de forma que seja apropriada para o tipo de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Reports that a key was pressed.
This method passes keyboard input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse método passa a entrada do teclado para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Cada coluna trata a entrada de forma que seja apropriada para o tipo de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The drawing instructions for the cell.
Draws the cell and the right side gridline.
The data for the event.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de que você chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnSelected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Reports text composition.
This method passes text input to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> that contains the cell.
trans-unit.target: Esse método passa a entrada de texto para o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Column%2A> que contém a célula.

trans-unit.source: Each column handles the input in a way that is appropriate for the column type.
trans-unit.target: Cada coluna trata a entrada de forma que seja apropriada para o tipo de coluna.

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected" /> event.
Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: A geração de um evento invoca o manipulador de eventos por meio de um delegado.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [tratamento e gerando eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected%2A> method also enables derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected%2A> método também permite que classes derivadas manipular o evento sem anexar um representante.

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Isso é a técnica preferida para manipular o evento em uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, make sure that you call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: Ao substituir <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> em uma classe derivada, certifique-se de que você chamar a classe base <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.OnUnselected(System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs)" /> método para que registrado delegados receber o evento.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the cell is selected.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> está definida como `true`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Selected" /> routed event.
Occurs when the cell selection is cleared.
This event occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> property is set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esse evento ocorre quando o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsSelected%2A> está definida como `false`.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.Unselected" /> routed event.
